suppress.comment: removing rows containing values along the following ICD9CM and ICD10CM parent codes using a lookup table for all concept_ids to be suppressed for gender_source_concept_id.  nothing should be removed
suppress.on: exists (select * from `:idataset.provider` as record2 where provider.provider_id = record2.provider_id and gender_source_concept_id in (select concept_id from `:idataset.concept_ids_suppression`))
